name: Witch Home Alabama - Hipster Bourguignon's Edition
name_original: Witch Home Alabama - Hipster Bourguignon's Edition
description:
"Witch Home Alabama" is a first draft completed in 7 hours in the prospect of ESAAix's Open Day on the 26th of January.

We took advantage of the Global Game Jam's theme and created some constraint aroung the extended theme "What is Home?".

WHACS takes place in near future Alabama cooking where a nice witch tries, for her housewarming party, to recreate the famous french Boeuf Bourguignon.

Due to time limit the Boeuf Bourguignon is done by mixing in the right order with the right amount boeuf and french vin. Game is in frenglish.

The prototype still needs a couple hours work but here's the first "avant-goût" of this cooking simulator.

Visuals by Aurélien Delauzun

Unity Development using Fungus by Leslie Astier
